key_risk_themes: ["Security Implementation Complexity","Asynchronous System Reliability","External Service Dependencies"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Mandate security code reviews and third-party penetration testing for all authentication flows (RISK-001).","Implement the Transactional Outbox pattern to ensure data consistency across services (RISK-006).","Ensure Redis and Job Scheduler infrastructure are deployed in a high-availability, multi-AZ configuration (RISK-003, RISK-002)."]
